nodes.text: A mass-driver missile launcher was a type of missile launcher used by the Galactic Republic throughout the Clone Wars. A twin set of mass-driver missile launchers were dorsally mounted to the Republic's Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry gunships, as well as RTT-04 armored troop transports. However, a set of twin EP-750X EMP missile launchers could be armed to LAAT/i gunships in place of a mass-driver missile launcher.
